channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Fall
item.description: Natural gas futures fell as the market watches Hurricane Milton, which is seen reaching Florida’s Gulf coast midweek as a major storm.

item.title: Investment Industry Loves Active ETFs. You Probably Shouldn't.
item.description: Launches of active exchange-traded funds are outnumbering passive ones by about three to one. The performance record isn’t great.

item.title: Butterfly Equity is taking luxury wine maker Duckhorn private in $1.95 billion all-cash deal
item.description: Duckhorn’s stock doubled on the news in premarket action.

item.title: U.S. Employment Trend Key For Dollar
item.description: The medium-term trend of U.S. employment is more important than one set of data for the Fed’s interest-rate decisions and therefore the dollar, Commer...

item.title: S&P 500 Slips, 10-Year Yields Climb
item.description: U.S. stock markets slipped to start the week, reversing course after a blockbuster jobs report sent stocks higher Friday.

item.title: These 12 stocks stand behind Goldman’s S&P 500 optimism — and Micron stands out
item.description: Goldman expects corporate profit margins to increase through 2026. These companies’ gross margins have already improved for four straight quarters.

item.title: ‘This was a money grab’: My uncle took over the family business when my grandfather died — and left my father out in the cold. What now?
item.description: “When my grandfather passed away, my uncle continued running the business and, at that point, he decided that my father would not receive any financia...

item.title: ‘I’m scared to death’: My wife asked for a divorce after 21 years. She wants to buy a house with our savings, but promises to help pay my mortgage.
item.description: “There is more than enough money in the savings to completely pay off the current mortgage.”

item.title: Barnes agrees to be acquired by Apollo for $3.6 billion in cash
item.description: Barnes Group Inc.’s stock rose 2.7% early Monday after the provider of engineered products and industrial technologies said it has reached an agreemen...

item.title: Gold Futures Rise on Safe-Haven Demand as Middle East Tensions Weigh
item.description: Gold futures prices increased as safe-haven demand offset a rise in U.S. Treasury yields.
